alert.note: Alert for Eastern Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued October 01 at 6:48AM EDT until October 02 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Beach Hazards Statement, a high risk for rip currents. * WHERE...Eastern Currituck County. * WHEN...Through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and a high risk for rip currents. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. COROLLA NC MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 5.5 FT, MODERATE 6.0 FT, MAJOR 6.5 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.3 FT, MAJOR 2.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/12 PM 5.2 1.5 1.0 6-7 NONE 02/12 AM 4.1 0.4 1.0 4-5 NONE 02/01 PM 5.3 1.6 1.2 3 NONE 03/01 AM 4.4 0.7 1.5 3-4 NONE 03/02 PM 7.0 3.3 3.0 8-10 MAJOR 04/03 AM 5.5 1.8 2.5 10 MINOR &&
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.
